content.en: Energy optimization: Researchers have been exploring various algorithms to optimize the energy management and operation of microgrids. These algorithms, such as the Improved Particle Swarm Optimization and Monte Carlo Simulation, Harmony Search, and Mixed-Integer Linear Programming, are used to address questions like how to minimize operation costs and emissions, achieve optimal economic dispatch, and optimize energy storage capacity. By applying these intelligent algorithms, researchers aim to develop strategies that can efficiently manage renewable energy sources and improve the overall performance of microgrids.
content.da: Energioptimering: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at optimere energistyring og drift af mikronet. Disse algoritmer, såsom Improved Particle Swarm Optimization og Monte Carlo Simulation, Harmony Search og Mixed-Integer Linear Programming, bruges til at tackle spørgsmål som hvordan man minimerer driftsomkostninger og emissioner, opnår optimal økonomisk fordeling og optimerer energilagringskapaciteten. Ved at anvende disse intelligente algoritmer sigter forskerne mod at udvikle strategier, der effektivt kan styre vedvarende energikilder og forbedre den overordnede ydeevne af mikronet.
